rows.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
rows.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
rows.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

rows.arabic: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
rows.translation: QAF. I CALL to witness the glorious Qur'an.
rows.transliteration: qāf ۚ wal qur-ānil majīd

rows.arabic: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
rows.translation: They are rather surprised that a warner from among themselves has come to them. So the unbelievers say: "This is astonishing:
rows.transliteration: bal `ajibū an jā-ahum mundhirun minhum faqālal-kāfirūna hādhā shay-un `ajīb

rows.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
rows.translation: When we are dead and turned to dust, this returning (to life) is most far-fetched."
rows.transliteration: a-idhā mitnā wakunnā turābā ۖ dhālika raj`un ba`īd

rows.arabic: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
rows.translation: We know what the earth consumes of them, for We have the Book that preserves everything.
rows.transliteration: qad `alimnā mā tanquṣul-arḍu minhum ۖ wa`indanā kitābun ḥafīẓ

rows.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
rows.translation: But no! They called the truth a lie when it came to them; so they are in a confused state.
rows.transliteration: bal kadhhabū bil ḥaqqi lammā jā-ahum fahum fī amrin marīj

rows.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
rows.translation: Have they not looked at the sky above them, how We have fashioned and adorned it, and it has no flaw?
rows.transliteration: afalam yanẓurū ilas samā-i fawqahum kayfa banaynāhā wazayyannāhā wa mā lahā min furūj

rows.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
rows.translation: We stretched the earth and placed upon it firm stabilisers and We made every kind of splendid thing to grow upon it
rows.transliteration: wal-arḍa madadnāhā wa-alqaynā fīhā rawāsiya wa-anbatnā fīhā min kulli zawjin bahīj

rows.arabic: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
rows.translation: As instruction and reminder to every penitent creature.
rows.transliteration: tabṣiratan wadhikrā likulli `abdin munīb

rows.arabic: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
rows.translation: And We send down water as a blessing from the sky, and grow gardens with it and the grain for harvest,
rows.transliteration: wanazzalnā minas samā-i mā-an mubārakan fa-anbatnā bihi jannātin waḥabbal ḥaṣīd

rows.arabic: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
rows.translation: And tall date-palms with their spathes pile on pile
rows.transliteration: wan nakhla bāsiqātin lahā ṭal`un naḍīd

rows.arabic: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
rows.translation: As a provision for men, and enlivened a region that was dead. Even thus will be the life after death.
rows.transliteration: rizqal lil`ibād ۖ wa-aḥyaynā bihi baldatan maytā ۚ kadhālikal khurūj

rows.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
rows.translation: The people of Noah, Ar-Rass and Thamud denied before you,
rows.transliteration: kadhhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣ-ḥābur rassi wathamūd

rows.arabic: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
rows.translation: As did the people of 'Ad and Pharaoh and the brethren of Lot,
rows.transliteration: wa`ādun wafir`awnu wa ikhwānu lūṭ

rows.arabic: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
rows.translation: And the dwellers of the Wood and people of Tubba'. Each of them denied the apostles. So My threat became a reality.
rows.transliteration: wa-aṣ-ḥābul-aykati waqawmu tubba` ۚ kullun kadhhabar rusula faḥaqqa wa`īd

rows.arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
rows.translation: Were We exhausted by the act of the first creation? And yet they are confused about a new creation.
rows.transliteration: afa`ayynā bil khalqil-awwal ۚ bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīd

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
rows.translation: He created man and surely know what misdoubts arise in their hearts; for We are closer to him than his jugular vein.
rows.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnal-insāna wana`lamu mā tuwaswisu bihi nafsuh ۖ wanaḥnu aqrabu ilayhi min ḥablil warīd

rows.arabic: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
rows.translation: When the two (angels) who keep the account, one sitting on the right, one on the left, take it down,
rows.transliteration: idh yatalaqqal mutalaqqiyāni `anil yamīni wa`anish shimāli qa`īd

rows.arabic: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
rows.translation: There is not a word he utters but an observer is ready (to make note of it).
rows.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun `atīd

rows.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
rows.translation: The palsy of death will surely come. This is what you wished to avert.
rows.transliteration: wajā-at sakratul mawti bil ḥaqq ۖ dhālika mā kunta minhu taḥīd

rows.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
rows.translation: And the trumpet blast will sound: It would be the Day of Doom.
rows.transliteration: wanufikha fiṣ ṣūr ۚ dhālika yawmul wa`īd

rows.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
rows.translation: Each soul will come with a driver and a witness.
rows.transliteration: wajā-at kullu nafsin ma`ahā sā-iqun washahīd

rows.arabic: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
rows.translation: (And the driver will say:) "You were oblivious of this, so we have removed the veil, and how keen is your sight today!"
rows.transliteration: laqad kunta fī ghaflatim min hādhā fakashafnā `anka ghiṭā-aka fabaṣarukal yawma ḥadīd

rows.arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
rows.translation: His companion will say: "Here is (the record) I have ready with me."
rows.transliteration: waqāla qarīnuhu hādhā mā ladayya `atīd

rows.arabic: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
rows.translation: "Cast each stubborn unbeliever into Hell," (they will be told),
rows.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin `anīd

rows.arabic: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
rows.translation: "Every obstructor of good, transgressor, and the sceptic,
rows.transliteration: mannā`in lilkhayri mu`tadin murīb

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
rows.translation: Who had set up another god with God. Cast him into severe torment."
rows.transliteration: alladhī ja`ala ma`allāhi ilāhan ākhara fa-alqiyāhu fil `adhābish shadīd

rows.arabic: قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
rows.translation: His companion will say: "O Lord, I did not lead him to wickedness, but he was himself far astray."
rows.transliteration: qāla qarīnuhu rabbanā mā aṭghaytuhu walākin kāna fī ḍalālin ba`īd

rows.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
rows.translation: "Do not argue in My presence. I had announced the promise of doom in advance.
rows.transliteration: qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil wa`īd

rows.arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
rows.translation: There is no changing of My word, nor am I unjust to My creatures."
rows.transliteration: mā yubaddalul qawlu ladayya wa mā ana biẓallāmin lil`abīd

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
rows.translation: We shall ask Hell that day: "Are you full?" It will answer: "Are there still more?"
rows.transliteration: yawma naqūlu lijahannama halim-tala-ti wataqūlu hal min mazīd

rows.arabic: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
rows.translation: And Paradise will be brought near, not far from those who took heed for themselves and feared God.
rows.transliteration: wa-uzlifatil jannatu lil-muttaqīna ghayra ba`īd

rows.arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
rows.translation: "This is what you had been promised," (will be said) to every penitent who remembered (his duty),
rows.transliteration: hādhā mā tū`adūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓ

rows.arabic: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
rows.translation: Who feared Ar-Rahman in secret, and came with a penitent heart:
rows.transliteration: man khashiyar raḥmāna bil ghaybi wajā-a biqalbin munīb

rows.arabic: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
rows.translation: "Enter it in peace. This is the day of life abiding."
rows.transliteration: ud-khulūhā bisalām ۖ dhālika yawmul khulūd

rows.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
rows.translation: Theirs will be whatsoever they wish: And with Us there is more.
rows.transliteration: lahum mā yashā-ūna fīhā waladaynā mazīd

rows.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
rows.translation: How many generations have We destroyed before them who were mightier in power than they. Then they searched throughout the land to see if there was a way of escape.
rows.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā qablahum min qarnin hum ashaddu minhum baṭshan fanaqqabū fil bilādi hal min maḥīṣ

rows.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
rows.translation: Surely there is a reminder in this for whosoever has a heart (to feel), or takes heed.
rows.transliteration: inna fī dhālika ladhikrā liman kāna lahu qalbun aw alqas sam`a wahuwa shahīd

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
rows.translation: We created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, in six spans, and no weariness came upon Us.
rows.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnas samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā baynahumā fī sittati ayyāmin wa mā massanā min lughūb

rows.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
rows.translation: So you bear with patience what they say, and sing the praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun and its setting,
rows.transliteration: faṣbir `alā mā yaqūlūna wasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika qabla ṭulū`ish shamsi waqablal-ghurūb

rows.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
rows.translation: And glorify Him for some portion of the night, and additional adorations.
rows.transliteration: wa minal layli fasabbiḥ-hu wa-adbāras sujūd

rows.arabic: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
rows.translation: Take heed that the day the crier calls from a place close (to every one),
rows.transliteration: wastami` yawma yunādil munādi min makānin qarīb

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
rows.translation: The day they actually hear the blast, will be the Day of rising of the dead.
rows.transliteration: yawma yasma`ūnaṣ ṣayḥata bil ḥaqq ۚ dhālika yawmul khurūj

rows.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
rows.translation: We are the one who give life and death, and to Us will be the destination.
rows.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥyī wanumītu wa ilaynal maṣīr

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
rows.translation: The day the earth will split asunder they will come out hurriedly. This gathering together is easy for Us.
rows.transliteration: yawma tashaqqaqul-arḍu `anhum sirā`ā ۚ dhālika ḥashrun `alaynā yasīr

rows.arabic: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
rows.translation: We are cognisant of what they say; but it is not for you to compel them. So keep on reminding through the Qur'an whoever fears My warning.
rows.transliteration: naḥnu a`lamu bimā yaqūlūn ۖ wa mā anta `alayhim bijabbār ۖ fadhakkir bil qur-āni man yakhāfu wa`īd
